Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの、<Annie>？ 浮かない顔ね……
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter, <Annie>? You look crestfallen...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……今、自分の事、占ってみたんですけど…… しばらくあまりいい事がないみたいなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: Just now, I tried reading my own fortune... But it seems as though nothing good is going to happen to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、占いの結果っていうのは 生きる上での道しるべでしかないのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, the results of your fortunes are nothing more than guides to help you get through life.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの今の状況と運気の流れをあわせて、 未来を予想する方法に過ぎない……
Entry.EnglishText: All they do is predict the future by taking your current situation alongside the flow of destiny into account.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自分が変われば未来だって変えられる…… そう、変えられるの……
Entry.EnglishText: Should you undergo a change, so too will your future... And change it certainly shall.
So... You need to do your best.
